edu.neu.ccs.cs5004.problem1.toddler

Class toddlerTeacher

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.neu.ccs.cs5004.problem1.abstractTeacher
      • edu.neu.ccs.cs5004.problem1.toddler.toddlerTeacher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITeacher

    public class toddlerTeacher
extends abstractTeacher
    A class representing a Toddler Teacher. A Toddler Teacher has all the same parameters of any other teacher with the addition of having a counting ability to keep track of children wearing diapers, and children who are potty trained.

      • toddlerTeacher

        public toddlerTeacher(Name name,
                      String classroom,
                      Name coteacher,
                      Integer currentNumberOfChildren,
                      Integer maximumNumberOfChildren,
                      Boolean vacationStatus,
                      Integer numberOfChildrenWearingDiapers,
                      Integer numberOfChildrenPottyTrained)
        Constructs a new Toddler Teacher object with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Toddler Teacher
        coteacher - the name of the Co Teacher of the Toddler Teacher
        classroom - the classroom of the Toddler Teacher
        currentNumberOfChildren - the current number of students in the classroom
        maximumNumberOfChildren - the maximum number of students in the classroom
        vacationStatus - the vacation status of the teacher
        numberOfChildrenWearingDiapers - the number of children wearing diapers in the classroom
        numberOfChildrenPottyTrained - the number of children potty trained in the classroom

      • convertSubstituteTeacher

        public abstractTeacher convertSubstituteTeacher(abstractTeacher substitute,
                                                String classroom,
                                                Name coteacher)
        Converts a substitute teacher into a full time toddler teacher by using the abstract class to help.
        Parameters:
        substitute - the substitute teacher wishing to be converted to full time
        classroom - the classroom she wants to be a full time teacher for
        coteacher - the co-teacher she will be teaching with
        Returns:
        a new toddler teacher
